attributes.action: Outlaw religious groups which advocate or support descrimination on the grounds of sexuality, gender, and/or race.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are a number of religious groups which advocate and/or support discrimination against people on the basis of their sexuality, gender, and/or race, and who use their religious beliefs as justification for this.  It is time to put an end to this.  Religious beliefs are no grounds to engage in such abhorrent behaviour, and we call for ANY group which promotes or supports such discrimination to be outlawed, and for legislation that ensures that religious beliefs cannot be used as a defence for such behaviour.
